verbs.description: at olympics [ARGM-DIS: chloe] kim [V: takes] [ARG1: family] on one more epic ride chloe kim would have made the olympic team with ease four years ago only to have the calendar get in the way she was 13 at the time too young to make the trip to russia beijing borandukht family kelly clark arielle gold chloe kim american dream gold medal of the royal astronomical society jong jin olympics switzerland
